document_data.name: Splint mail
document_data.mainbody: '''Splint mail''' (or simply '''splint''') was a type of armor used on [[Toril]].
document_data.Description: Splint mail was made up of several vertical strips of [[:category:metals|metal]] (known as splints) that were riveted to a backing of leather. Splint was worn over cloth padding.
document_data.Availabity:
* In [[Faerûn]], splint mail was common in [[Cormyr]], [[Turmish]], and [[Vaasa]].<ref name=PGtF-p15">
* Splint mail was rather rare in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.History: Splint mail was believed to have been first developed by [[dwarves]].

Notable wearers.Religions:
*[[Tempus#Hierarchy|Arahar]]s of [[Tempus]].
* Splint mail was one of two types of armor that [[chaos knight]]s, a variety of [[specialty priest]] of the [[Church of Talos]], generally favored. However, the splint mail of chaos knights was notably black in coloration and decorated with barbs.<ref>
* Splint mail was among the types of armor that [[gloryblood]]s, a variety of specialty priest of the [[Church of Tempus]], most often wore.<ref>
* [[Moon Knights]], a variety of specialty priest of the [[Church of Selûne]], wore splint armor that had a silver or white coloration and the twin eyes of [[Selûne]] emblazoned across the chest.
* Splint mail was among the types of armor that [[Sword of Cyric|swords of Cyric]], a variety of specialty priest of the [[Church of Cyric]], most often wore.<ref>
